00037   void __cdecl InternalThreadRoutine(void* opaque) {
00038     ThreadInternal* internal = (ThreadInternal*)opaque;
00039 
00040     int priority;
00041     if (internal->priority < -2) {
00042       priority = THREAD_PRIORITY_IDLE;

00044       priority = THREAD_PRIORITY_LOWEST;
00045     } else if (internal->priority == -1) {
00046       priority = THREAD_PRIORITY_BELOW_NORMAL;
00047     } else if (internal->priority == 0) {
00048       priority = THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL;
00049     } else if (internal->priority == 1) {
00050       priority = THREAD_PRIORITY_ABOVE_NORMAL;
00051     } else {
00052       priority = THREAD_PRIORITY_HIGHEST;
00053     }
00054

00057 
00058     // call the function passed
